databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.GAISAN_KEIJO_ID , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.OD_JRY_ID ,
OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.OD_SHR_ID , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.AMOUNT , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.NEBIKI_AMOUNT , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.TAX , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.KAMOKU_NO , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO ,
OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.MS_USER_ID , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.RENEW_DATE , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.RENEW_USER_ID FROM OD_GAISAN_KEIJO

SELECT OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.GAISAN_KEIJO_ID , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.OD_JRY_ID ,
OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.OD_SHR_ID , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.AMOUNT , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.NEBIKI_AMOUNT , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.TAX , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.KAMOKU_NO , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO ,
OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.MS_USER_ID , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.RENEW_DATE , OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.RENEW_USER_ID FROM OD_GAISAN_KEIJO WHERE OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.GAISAN_KEIJO_ID = :GAISAN_KEIJO_ID

INSERT INTO OD_GAISAN_KEIJO ( GAISAN_KEIJO_ID , GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI , OD_JRY_ID ,
OD_SHR_ID , AMOUNT , NEBIKI_AMOUNT , TAX , KAMOKU_NO , UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO ,
MS_USER_ID , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :GAISAN_KEIJO_ID , :GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI , :OD_JRY_ID ,
:OD_SHR_ID , :AMOUNT , :NEBIKI_AMOUNT , :TAX , :KAMOKU_NO , :UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO ,
:MS_USER_ID , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE OD_GAISAN_KEIJO SET OD_JRY_ID = :OD_JRY_ID ,
OD_SHR_ID = :OD_SHR_ID , AMOUNT = :AMOUNT , NEBIKI_AMOUNT = :NEBIKI_AMOUNT , TAX = :TAX , KAMOKU_NO = :KAMOKU_NO , UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO = :UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO ,
MS_USER_ID = :MS_USER_ID , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE GAISAN_KEIJO_ID = :GAISAN_KEIJO_ID
